Text: wow! thx a lot. very detailed documentary including many news for me ;-) Cheers

Nobody seemed to to be willing to seed (except a nice Swe peer ;-) although I was good enough to seed over 4 Ratio (    http://h.imagehost.org/0923/generous_upload.jpg    ).
Any way I'll encode them to about 5.5 GB (x264 High Profile). If you don't mind Ubehage I might up it for those with slower internet, 27 GB is a hell of alot if nobody seeds it. Cheers.
